actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Consumer Protection and Competitiveness.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Consumer Protection, and Competitiveness

official_title: To provide for the labeling or marking of tropical wood and tropical wood products sold in the United States.
short_title: Tropical Forest Consumer Information and Protection Act of 1990

summary.text: Tropical Forest Consumer Information and Protection Act of 1990 - Prohibits manufacturing or distributing any tropical wood or tropical wood product unless it bears a label or mark indicating the country in which the wood was grown. Requires sellers through a catalog or communications media to disclose the country of origin. Allows the Secretary of Commerce to assess civil penalties or order compliance.

titles.title: Tropical Forest Consumer Information and Protection Act of 1990
To provide for the labeling or marking of tropical wood and tropical wood products sold in the United States.
